titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen a proclamation ... whereas we have received information that James Campbell, commonly called Captain Campbell, Archibald Montgomery, and Sir John Johnston ... did in a forcible manner seize upon ... Mary Wharton and carried her away ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our Court at Whitehall the fifteenth day of November, 1690, in the second year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
